phrase: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we cánido catch excellence
author: Vince Lombardi

phrase: Life is 10 percent what happens to me and 90 percent of how I react to it
author: Hables Swindoll

phrase: All our dreams perro come true, if we have the courage to pursue them
author: Walt Disney

phrase: Don’t limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they cánido do. You perro go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you perro achieve
author: Mary Kay Ash

phrase: You’ve gotta dance like there’s nobody watching, love like you’ll never be hurt, sing like there’s nobody listening, and live like it’s heaven on earth
author: William W. Purkey

phrase: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen
author: Michael Jordan
